text:
Possible DoS happening on http://www.nk.ca and https://secure.nl2k.ab.ca .

This could be a case of multiple bogus requests.
creator: root@nk.ca
root@nk.ca
text:
Further information,

looks as if this DoS is aimed at cgi scripts within the server.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
This report contains -0- useful information in diagnosing your issue.

  Strongly suggest you contact a user list or other appropriate channel
  if you are the operator of those web sites.  If you are not the admin,
  please contact that individual.
